testcase.classname: Reqres isimli sayfanin Api testlerinin yapilmasi
testcase.name: https://reqres.in/api/unknown adresine get request gonderip ve donen "text" degerinin :"To keep ReqRes free, contributions towards server costs are appreciated!" oldugunu test edin
testcase.system-out: Given Api kullanicisi "api/unknown" path parametrelerini set eder...........passed Then Donen Responsun text degerinin "istenilenDeger" oldugunu test eder.....passed
